name: claudius-skills-marketplace
description: Production-ready Claude Code extensibility configurations covering all five pillars: Skills (87), Slash Commands (80+), Hooks (36), Subagents (46), and MCP Servers (20+). Progressive learning from beginner to enterprise level.

plugins.name: claudius-core
plugins.description: Core skills and rules: version-checker, class-builder, knowledge cutoff awareness, and strict TypeScript patterns
plugins.readme: Core Claude Code configurations with critical safety systems including knowledge cutoff awareness and strict TypeScript type checking.

plugins.name: starter-kit
plugins.description: Beginner-friendly starter kit with 5 skills, 12 commands, 4 subagents, and 5 hooks covering essential development workflows
plugins.readme: Perfect starting point for Claude Code beginners. Includes readme-generator, code-explainer, bug-finder, test-helper, and git-helper skills with intuitive slash commands.

plugins.name: intermediate-kit
plugins.description: Production-ready kit with 10 framework-specific skills, 15 workflow commands, 6 domain experts, and advanced hooks
plugins.readme: Framework-specific development with React, Vue, Express, FastAPI, Django, Next.js, GraphQL generators plus deployment, security, and performance commands.

plugins.name: advanced-kit
plugins.description: Enterprise-grade kit with 15 skills, 20 commands, 10 specialist agents for microservices, compliance, and platform engineering
plugins.readme: Enterprise architecture with microservices orchestration, compliance frameworks (SOC2/HIPAA/GDPR), distributed tracing, and internal platform building.

plugins.name: railway-deployment-kit
plugins.description: Complete Railway.app deployment toolkit with 5 skills, 6 commands, 4 specialists for PostgreSQL, MinIO, Qdrant, and multi-environment management
plugins.readme: Railway.app deployment automation with PostgreSQL management, MinIO object storage, Qdrant vector database, and production deployment workflows.

plugins.name: eliza-os-kit
plugins.description: Master-level elizaOS development kit with 6 skills, 8 commands, 6 specialists, and 17 hooks for AI agent development
plugins.readme: Complete elizaOS framework development with character generation, plugin scaffolding, knowledge base building, memory optimization, and production deployment.

plugins.name: competitive-ai-frameworks
plugins.description: Multi-agent competitive simulations with 3 skills and 12 specialist agents for bug hunting, code quality, and user flow testing
plugins.readme: Team-based AI simulations for bug hunting, code quality assessment, and user flow testing with reinforcement learning and competitive scoring.

plugins.name: productivity-starter
plugins.description: Productivity-focused starter kit with 5 essential workflow skills for daily development tasks
plugins.readme: Boost daily productivity with workflow automation, task management, and efficiency-focused skills for common development tasks.

plugins.name: productivity-intermediate
plugins.description: Advanced productivity kit with sophisticated workflow automation and team collaboration features
plugins.readme: Advanced productivity features with team collaboration, sophisticated automation, and enterprise workflow management.

plugins.name: external-repo-bootstrap
plugins.description: Bootstrap kit for accessing Claudius Skills from external repositories with 3 essential skills and commands
plugins.readme: Quick setup for external projects to access and use Claudius Skills configurations without full repository cloning.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-development-safety
plugins.description: 5 essential development safety hooks preventing common mistakes and enforcing best practices
plugins.readme: Prevent common mistakes with hooks for force push protection, secret detection, destructive operation confirmation, and .env file safety.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-production-deployment
plugins.description: 5 production deployment safety hooks ensuring safe releases and deployments
plugins.readme: Production deployment safety with pre-deployment checks, migration confirmations, and rollback protection.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-code-quality
plugins.description: 5 code quality enforcement hooks for maintaining standards and best practices
plugins.readme: Enforce code quality with pre-commit linting, test requirements, coverage thresholds, and complexity checks.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-security-enforcement
plugins.description: 5 security enforcement hooks for vulnerability scanning and compliance
plugins.readme: Security enforcement with dependency scanning, license compliance, CORS validation, and security header checks.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-knowledge-cutoff
plugins.description: 5 knowledge cutoff awareness hooks for version verification and API compatibility checking
plugins.readme: Verify current package versions, API compatibility, and breaking changes to prevent knowledge cutoff issues.

plugins.name: hooks-collection-strict-typing
plugins.description: 6 strict TypeScript typing hooks enforcing zero-any and explicit types
plugins.readme: Enforce strict TypeScript patterns with no-any validation, explicit return types, class preferences, and full type safety.

plugins.name: framework-rules-react
plugins.description: React framework best practices and patterns
plugins.readme: React-specific development rules and best practices for component architecture, hooks, and state management.

plugins.name: framework-rules-vue
plugins.description: Vue 3 framework best practices with Composition API
plugins.readme: Vue 3 development patterns with Composition API, TypeScript integration, and component best practices.

plugins.name: framework-rules-nextjs
plugins.description: Next.js 13+ App Router patterns and best practices
plugins.readme: Next.js 13+ development with App Router, Server/Client Components, and data fetching patterns.

plugins.name: framework-rules-django
plugins.description: Django framework patterns for Python web development
plugins.readme: Django development patterns with model design, view patterns, ORM best practices, and security.

plugins.name: framework-rules-fastapi
plugins.description: FastAPI async patterns and Pydantic models
plugins.readme: FastAPI development with async/await patterns, Pydantic validation, and OpenAPI documentation.

plugins.name: example-skills-beginner
plugins.description: 7 beginner-level example skills for learning Claude Code extensibility
plugins.readme: Learn Claude Code basics with simple, well-documented example skills covering common development tasks.

plugins.name: example-skills-intermediate
plugins.description: 19 intermediate-level example skills with framework-specific and niche capabilities
plugins.readme: Intermediate examples including framework generators, workflow automation, security patterns, and performance optimization.

plugins.name: example-skills-advanced
plugins.description: 14 advanced example skills covering emerging technologies and complex patterns
plugins.readme: Advanced patterns including WebAssembly, GraphQL federation, blockchain, edge computing, and complex architectures.

plugins.name: modern-commands
plugins.description: 10 modern workflow commands for contemporary development practices
plugins.readme: Modern development commands including AI-assisted workflows, containerization, observability, and GitOps patterns.

plugins.name: specialized-agents
plugins.description: 4 specialized consultant agents for expert domain guidance
plugins.readme: Expert consultant agents providing specialized guidance for complex technical decisions and architecture.
